subject: Saturday Night Teaser
event:
For those for you who were not watching HBO tonight (Saturday) here's the teaser you missed:

<lj-embed id="102"/>

More coming soon.  Like real soon.  Like tomorrow (Sunday), just before the 8pm (eastern time) movie.  So tune in ten minutes early to catch a new promo.

comments.article:
The biggest revelation to me? I've been pronouncing Baratheon wrong!

I can't wait for this!!!!
Yeah, you're not the only one!
how exciting! it looks amazing, and i'm proud of all the support hbo is lending it. got my fingers crossed for success!
I can't wait:) hope, russian TV-companies will buy rights on this series^)
.. oh my.  And I've been saying Ba-ruh-THEE-un all these years.... this is going to take some getting used to.

comments.upictitle: маленький цЫфровой ревербератор Michael Lyahovich: баран
comments.article:
O-ho
Thank you very much, Sir
I can't handle these teasers.  They get me TOO excited I feel like I'm going to have a seizure.
Well...it seems I've been pronouncing Baratheon wrong all this time.
I'm SO excited for this. It's going to be epic. Do we officially know when the first episode will air?

comments.upictitle: Proud to be a geek.  Proud to be a gentleman.: data-wtf
comments.article: I just wet myself in anticipation.

So friggin' awesome!! I can't wait for the series! I think that's the thing I most look for in 2011 (except for the possibility of ADWD).

I hope you post the new promo here as well, for us poor ol' european people with no HBO...
Wow.  I am so excited!

Can't wait for it!

Any idea of an ETA for the first episodes?

Love Fairley in this very brief clip we've gotten. There was a confusion on HBO's end regarding things, though, and I do not believe there actually is an 8PM film on Sunday night. I suspect the teaser will run either just before or just after Boardwalk Empire instead. Probably just before.

For international fans, no worries, HBO will get the teaser up on-line at Making Game of Thrones right after it airs. We've already annotated this particular peek at "Inside Game of Thrones", and hope to do the same with the third promo.

BTW, the Mountain could use a bit of nudge to overthrow the Reaper. It's literally a dead heat, after more than 1,700 votes!

Thanks for that info, hippoiathanatoi! Here in Canada, the Grey Cup is on tonight - the CFL's equivalent to the Super Bowl - which will pre-empt my ability to see the teaser "live," so to speak. Good to know I can see it shortly after on the HBO site!
I'd greatly appreciate if you posted tomorrow's too, so I can check it when I get home from work! (we still live like neanderthals here without any form of TiVo)
such a wonderful Tyrion!

Agreed.

I actually had Peter Dinklage in my mind as I read the books.
He has a gift for delivering convincing wit and sarcasm.
HBO sure knows how to lure us! I can't wait to watch this, thank you for sharing! ;)
Urk... I... Gosh... It's... 't's just... Agh! Uff! Perfect!.... :))))))
comments.subject: Preview

comments.article: GoT probably will arrive in Italy in september, or later. Will I read again tha book before Tv serie or before Dance with Dragons?? I'm undecided...
comments.subject: what i can do?

comments.article:
As much as I love to see more of the GoT series, I really get the idea that HBO is milking this thing a bit too far. I mean, a teaser for a promo for a 'making of' documentary for a TV series? Come on!
Maybe I should just enforce a GoT teaser blackout on myself and wait 'til I can download the HD pilot (as I'm in the Netherlands, I really don't want to wait until it airs on TV over here...).
it looks amazing. I love the scene with Peter Dinklage (Tyrion).
I am soooooooooo excited
Getting so jazzed for this series!
Looking forward to it! Thanks for sharing this latest teaser!
great stuff. a bit of a tease, but that's a teaser for you. i both love and loathe these early looks, and i'll be watching every one that airs leading into the debut.
comments.subject: oh, i saw it

comments.article: SO cool!!
